name: Herd Skulker
description: The Herd Skulker is a medium monstrosity known for its cunning and stealthy nature, capable of shapeshifting into domesticated herd animals to blend in seamlessly.
memorable: Unique shapeshifting ability allows it to deceive both animals and adventurers.
goals: To manipulate its surroundings and avoid direct confrontation.
relations: Can coexist with domesticated herd animals, perceived as part of their group.
environment: Typically found in areas where domesticated herd animals reside.
strengths: High dexterity enhances stealth capabilities and mobility.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its effectiveness in mental tasks.
attacks: Melee bite attack that can knock targets prone and deals significant piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Change Shape allows it to become a herd animal, gaining advantage on stealth and deception checks.
senses: Possesses keen hearing and smell, giving it advantage on perception checks reliant on those senses.
skills: Proficient in perception, although with a modest bonus.
additional_information: Can use Nimble Escape for tactical advantage.
Maintains the same statistics in animal form aside from size.
Ability to manipulate domesticated herd animals' perceptions.
Gains advantage on stealth and deception when in animal form.
